column1: #text=One day I noticed that I was running out of food and needed to go grocery shopping .
#text=I drove down to Sams Club and showed the man my card , got my shopping cart , and was on my way to get my things .
#text=I went through the aisles picking up everything I needed .
#text=Steaks , milk , eggs , pizza , bread , all the usual things .
#text=I also stopped along the way and tried some of the free samples they had in the store .
#text=The ice cream sandwich I tried was so good I ended up getting a box even though it was not on my list .
#text=After I had everything that I needed I took my cart to the register and waited in line to get checked out .
#text=I put all my items on the belt and got rung up by the cashier .
#text=I then paid the woman and left the store .
#text=On the way out I decided to rent a Redbox movie for the night since the kiosk was right by the store .
